section.title: Listen to AI Agents Handle Real
section.description: Experience how our AI agents professionally manage different types of patient calls with medical expertise and empathy.

demos.title: Emergency After-Hours Call
demos.description: AI agent handles urgent patient call outside office hours with proper emergency protocols
demos.scenario: Patient with chest pain calling after hours

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Dubai Medical Center emergency line, this is your AI assistant. I detect this may be urgent - please describe your symptoms.

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: I'm having chest pain and shortness of breath. Should I go to the hospital?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'm immediately connecting you to our on-call physician and have notified emergency services. Please stay on the line while I transfer you to Dr. Hassan.

demos.title: Specialist Appointment Booking
demos.description: Complex scheduling for specialist consultation with insurance verification

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Dubai Medical Center. How may I assist you today?

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: I need to see a cardiologist. My doctor said I need a stress test.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I can help schedule your cardiology appointment. Let me verify your insurance covers this procedure and find the earliest available slot with Dr. Al-Rashid.

demos.title: Prescription Refill Request
demos.description: Patient requesting medication refill with pharmacy coordination

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to refill my insulin prescription. I'm running low.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I see your insulin prescription in our system. I'll send the refill request to Dr. Ahmed for approval and notify your pharmacy. You should have it ready for pickup by tomorrow afternoon.

demos.title: Insurance Query in Arabic
demos.description: Arabic-speaking patient asking about insurance coverage for treatment
demos.scenario: Patient inquiring about insurance coverage in Arabic

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: مرحبا، أريد أن أعرف إذا كان التأمين يغطي العملية

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: أهلاً وسهلاً. سأتحقق من تغطية التأمين الخاص بك للعملية المطلوبة. دعني أراجع ملفك الطبي وبوليصة التأمين.

demos.title: Post-Surgery Follow-up
demos.description: Automated follow-up call checking on patient recovery after procedure

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Good afternoon, Mrs. Khan. This is a follow-up call from Dubai Medical Center. How are you feeling after your surgery yesterday?

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: Much better, thank you. The pain is manageable with the medication.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Excellent. I'll update your recovery notes and schedule your follow-up appointment with Dr. Patel for next week.
